game.name: DCS: F-16C The Gamblers Campaign by Baltic Dragon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The Gamblers campaign was jointly developed by Baltic Dragon and John ‘Rain’ Waters, a former Viper Demo Team pilot, member of the 77th Fighter Squadron and host of the Afterburn Podcast.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Gamblers campaign was jointly developed by Baltic Dragon and John ‘Rain’ Waters, a former Viper Demo Team pilot, member of the 77th Fighter Squadron and host of the Afterburn Podcast.
